name: Aquatic Adaptation
description: Modifies armor for underwater operation, allowing extended aquatic deployment.

name: Armorplast
description: Adds armorplast coating to improve protection without increasing weight significantly.

name: Climbing Claws
description: Integrated claws for scaling vertical surfaces and improving grip.

name: Diagnostics System
description: Monitors wearer's vital signs and armor integrity, providing real-time diagnostics.

name: Environmental Systems
description: Climate control and environmental protection for diverse planetary conditions.

name: Gyro
description: Gyroscopic stabilization system for improved balance and movement.

name: Helmet Package
description: Complete helmet with visor, comm system, and integrated targeting display.

name: Holoshroud
description: Holographic camouflage system that masks the wearer's appearance.

name: Integrated Equipment, 1 Slot
description: Mounts single item of equipment (maximum size 1 upgrade slot) directly to armor.

name: Integrated Equipment, 2 Slots
description: Mounts item of equipment (maximum size 2 upgrade slots) directly to armor.

name: Integrated Equipment, 5 Slots
description: Mounts item of equipment (maximum size 5 upgrade slots) directly to armor.

name: Integrated Equipment, 10 Slots
description: Mounts large item of equipment (maximum size 10 upgrade slots) directly to armor.

name: Internal Generator
description: Integrated power generator for sustainable operation of armor systems.

name: Jump Servos
description: Servo-assisted jumping, allowing greater distance and height in jumps.

name: Powered Exoskeleton
description: External powered framework dramatically increasing strength and load capacity.

name: Radiation Shielding
description: Shielding against radiation and energy-based environmental hazards.

name: Rangefinder
description: Integrated rangefinder system for tactical targeting assistance.

name: Ready Harness
description: Quick-release system for carrying and accessing equipment while armored.

name: Repulsorlift Unit
description: Repulsorlift generator for hovering and limited flight capability.

name: Shadowskin
description: Light-absorbing surface material for improved concealment in darkness.

name: Reflec Shadowskin
description: Advanced reflective camouflage system combining light absorption and reflection.

name: Shield Generator, SR 5
description: Personal shield generator providing SR 5 damage reduction.

name: Shield Generator, SR 10
description: Advanced shield generator providing SR 10 damage reduction.

name: Shockweb
description: Electrified web net deployed from armor for area denial and crowd control.

name: Vacuum Seals, Standard
description: Seals armor against vacuum and hard vacuum environments.

name: Vacuum Seals, Improved
description: Advanced vacuum seals with life support for extended space operations.

name: Weapon Mount, Standard
description: Hardpoint for mounting weapons directly to armor for integrated combat system.

name: Armor Reinforcement
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: Reinforces armor structure for increased protection.

name: Mesh Underlay
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: Mesh layer beneath armor improves flexibility and impact resistance.
